Package json

Class Adapter<E>

  • java.lang.Object
    • json.Adapter<E>
  • Type Parameters:
    E - The top of the class hierarchy
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.google.gson.JsonDeserializer<E>, com.google.gson.JsonSerializer<E>
    public class Adapter<E>
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.google.gson.JsonSerializer<E>, com.google.gson.JsonDeserializer<E>
    A generic type adapter for Gson, which deals with structures, where a statically typed element can have dynamic sub-types. The solution is a simple adaptation of https://github.com/mperdikeas/json-polymorphism, which can be used in a generic way. The type parameter E refers to the top of the class hierarchy resp. to the static type, which is dynamically sub-typed in the structure.
    Author:
    Menelaos Perdikeas, https://github.com/mperdikeas, Ekkart Kindler, ekki@dtu.dk, Malte B. Kristensen,s185039@student.dtu.dk
